      • throwOnUnsupportedFeatures

      • applySinglesUnwrapping

        public static org.apache.kafka.connect.data.ConnectSchema applySinglesUnwrapping(org.apache.kafka.connect.data.Schema schema,
                                                                                 SerdeFeatures features)
        Applies any single column unwrapping.
        Parameters:
        schema - the schema of the key or value columns. Must be a Struct.
        features - the serde features to apply.
        Returns:
        If the supplied features includes SerdeFeature.UNWRAP_SINGLES the returned schema will be unwrapped, i.e. an anonymous type.

      • wrapSingle
